steps.title: How to Detect Watermarks in {{FileformatCap}} Files via {{EnvName}}

content.title: With **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})**, identifying embedded watermarks in your business documents is simplified. Bring its capabilities into your {{EnvName}} workflows for seamless detection.
content.step_1: Begin by loading the {{FileformatCap}} document into an instance of the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class. Accepts input as a path, stream, or byte array.
content.step_2: Narrow your search using the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object. To find image-based marks, use a sample image. For textual ones, specify characteristics such as content, style, or color.
content.step_3: Invoke the {{TextSearchBold}} method from the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} object to extract watermark data. A collection of watermark instances will be returned for inspection.
content.step_4: After retrieval, you can manage the results: remove undesired marks, or update details such as dimensions or message content.
